title: How to Fix Saints Row 4 Crashes

steps.title: Right click your Desktop, select NVIDIA Control Panel.
steps.content: Right click your Desktop, select NVIDIA Control Panel.

steps.title: Click "Manage 3D Settings" link on the left side panel.
steps.content: Click "Manage 3D Settings" link on the left side panel.

steps.title: Click the Program Settings tab.
steps.content: Click the Program Settings tab.

steps.title: Click the Add button.
steps.content: Click the Add button.

steps.title: Browse and add the following folder:
steps.content: Browse and add the following folder: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Saints Row IV\

steps.title: Disable the Threaded Optimization feature.
steps.content: Disable the Threaded Optimization feature.

steps.title: Save the settings and exit.
steps.content: Save the settings and exit.

steps.title: Open the Registry Editor.
steps.content: Open the Registry Editor. Press Windows Key + X. Select Search. Type "RegEdit" in the Search Box. Click the Apps icon, and open that from the Search Results. For Windows 7/ Vista, press Windows Key + R. Type "RegEdit" in the "Open" textbox. Click the OK button.

steps.title: The Registry Editor will open.
steps.content: The Registry Editor will open. Locate the following sub key: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\VALVE

steps.title: Right click the "VALVE" sub key, select Permissions from the context menu.
steps.content: Right click the "VALVE" sub key, select Permissions from the context menu.

steps.title: Check the "Allow" box for all the following items:
steps.content: Check the "Allow" box for all the following items: Full Control Read Special permissions

steps.title: Click Apply, and then OK.
steps.content: Click Apply, and then OK.

steps.title: Exit the Registry Editor.
steps.content: Exit the Registry Editor.

steps.title: Double click the Steam icon on your Desktop.
steps.content: Double click the Steam icon on your Desktop.

steps.title: Sign-in to your Steam account.
steps.content: Sign-in to your Steam account.

steps.title: The Game Library will be displayed.
steps.content: The Game Library will be displayed. Right click the Saints Row 4 icon, select Properties option.

steps.title: Click the Local Files tab.
steps.content: Click the Local Files tab.

steps.title: Click "Verify integrity of game cache" button.
steps.content: Click "Verify integrity of game cache" button. The process may take a few minutes.

steps.title: Press the Windows Key + R keys simultaneously.
steps.content: Press the Windows Key + R keys simultaneously.

steps.title: Type "sysdm.cpl" in the Open textbox.
steps.content: Type "sysdm.cpl" in the Open textbox.

steps.title: Click the OK button.
steps.content: Click the OK button.

steps.title: System Properties dialog will open.
steps.content: System Properties dialog will open.

steps.title: Click the Advanced tab.
steps.content: Click the Advanced tab.

steps.title: Click the Settings button under "Performance" frame.
steps.content: Click the Settings button under "Performance" frame.

steps.title: Click the Data Execution Prevention tab.
steps.content: Click the Data Execution Prevention tab.

steps.title: Select "Turn on DEP for all programs and services except those I select" option.
steps.content: Select "Turn on DEP for all programs and services except those I select" option.

steps.title: Click the Add button.
steps.content: Click the Add button.

steps.title: Add the following launcher file:
steps.content: Add the following launcher file: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Saints Row IV\SaintsRowIV.exe

steps.title: Click OK | OK.
steps.content: Click OK | OK.

steps.title: Exit all open programs.
steps.content: Exit all open programs.

steps.title: Open the Command Prompt as administrator.
steps.content: Open the Command Prompt as administrator. If you're using Windows 8.1/ 8, press Windows Key + X simultaneously and select "Command Prompt (Admin)". If you're using Windows 7/ Vista, click the Start button. Click All Programs | Accessories. Right click Command Prompt, select "Run as administrator".

steps.title: Execute the following two commands in the given manner.
steps.content: Execute the following two commands in the given manner. Press ENTER at the end of every command. CD C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Saints RowIV\_CommonRedist\DirectX\Jun2010\ DXSETUP.EXE

steps.title: Microsoft DirectX Setup program will initiate.
steps.content: Microsoft DirectX Setup program will initiate. Reinstall the DirectX and then restart your computer.
